entry.title: Fallback method for opening web applications in iframe if loading fails
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am trying to implement a fallback mechanism for opening a web application inside an iframe. If the app fails to load in the iframe, I want to automatically open it in a new browser tab.

Here’s are the implementations that I have tried so far, I am providing a brute code of the methods that I have tried implementing:

onTilePress: function (oEvent) {
    var sUrl = oEvent.getSource().getBindingContext("appModel").getProperty("url");
    var oFrame = this.byId("appFrame");

    // attachAfterRendering for iframe handling
    oFrame.attachAfterRendering({ url: sUrl }, function (oEvent, oData) {
        var iframe = document.querySelector("iframe");

        if (!iframe) {
            console.error("Iframe not found");
            return;
        }

        // Listen for load success/failure
        iframe.onload = function () {
            console.log("App loaded successfully in iframe");
        };

        iframe.onerror = function () {
            console.error("Error loading app in iframe, opening in new tab");
            window.open(oData.url, "_blank");
        };

        // Safety fallback - message event listener
        window.addEventListener("message", function (e) {
            console.log("Message received from origin:", e.origin);
            // Expected origin is from embedded app, but I only get the portal origin here
        });

        // Detach afterrendering after execution
        oFrame.detachAfterRendering();
    });
}

 

Challenges I am facing:

  1. iframe.onload and iframe.onerror are never triggered – not even for successful apps.

  2. onAfterRendering only detects the UI5 HTML control render, not the internal iframe load state.

  3. When listening for postMessage, I get the custom portal origin (e.g., https://port8081-workspaces...) instead of the embedded app’s origin, so I cannot distinguish failures correctly.


    Can someone please help me to find a correct way to detect if an app inside an iframe has failed to load in SAP UI5 (so that I can implement a proper fallback to open it in a new tab)?
    Also suggest if is there a recommended UI5 mechanism to achieve this?

    Thanks in advance,
    Sai Krishna.

entry.title: SAP Fiori not calling Odata. RAP Preview working fine
entry.content:
Hi,

In my current project, I’m developing a SAP Fiori app using Visual Studio Code. However, the main challenge is that VS Code isn’t connected to the SAP backend. To work around this, I’m downloading an existing app using the standard program /UI5/UI5_REPOSITORY_LOAD, making the necessary changes locally, and then uploading it back to the SAP backend using the same program. This process creates a BSP application.

The backend OData service has been generated using RAP. When I preview the service binding in Eclipse, everything works perfectly—the OData call is successful, and the view is rendered correctly. 

The Network tab in the Edge browser’s Developer Tools confirms this, as shown in the screenshot. No issues so far.

To replicate this behavior in my standalone Fiori app, I checked the source in the app preview to identify the URI being called.

I then used this exact URI in the manifest.json file of my app in VS Code. The screenshot below shows the manifest.json from my standalone VS Code project.

However, when I test the app using SE80 (by right-clicking and selecting Test in SAPGUI after uploading), the OData service isn’t being called, and the view isn’t generated. The screen remains blank. The Network tab in Edge shows no OData activity, and although the Console logs some generic errors, they also appear in other working apps.

I’ve checked all the usual places for errors—/IWFND/ERROR_LOG, ST22, SLG1, and SU53—but found nothing relevant.

Network in Developer tool of the Edge browser doesn't show any Odata call.

Console shows some error, but these are generic error which I can see in other apps as well which are working just fine.

I’m stuck at this point and would really appreciate any guidance on what might be going wrong or what else I can check.

Thanks,

entry.title: Issue with sap.m.MenuButton in UI5 1.139.0
entry.content:
Hi,

We are experiencing issues with the sap.m.MenuButton control after upgrade to 1.139.0. We believe it is caused by the update in sap.m.Menu to let oData requests finish loading before showing the popup (comparison is 1.138.1 -> 1.139.0):

The dataReceived event has usually already fired when the menu is loaded as part of a menu button.

Can you look into this please? We are using the managed launchpad and we have buttons like these in shell plugins. Since shell plugins in turn do not respect the "manifest.json"/"sap.platform.cf/"ui5VersionNumber" we do not have a way to force a lower version either. Any advice on how to workaround it until fixed is also greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

//Carl

entry.content:

{ "error": "invalid_request", "error_description": "Error unknown state value." }

Is there a specific configuration that needs to be added to the system in order to resolve this issue?

entry.title: Enabling key user UI adaptation for custom controls in SAPUI5
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’ve developed a custom control based on a web component library and wrapped it in a SAPUI5 component. The control supports variant and p13n management, and Key Users can define public variants reflecting personalization state. However, in "Adapt UI" mode, I can only move the control, there’s no option to configure p13n settings like with SmartTable.

I couldn’t find any documentation or examples showing how to expose p13n features to the Key User Adaptation UI for custom controls. (SAPUI5: UI Development Toolkit for HTML5) 

  • Is it possible to enable full UI adaptation (e.g., p13n access) for custom controls?
  • Do I need to implement specific interfaces or metadata annotations to make it work?

Any guidance or working examples would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
The Missing Link: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
Hi everyone,

I've just built an RAP application using Eclipse ADT and then generated the SAPUI5 app from the service binding in VS Code. After successfully deploying it to my S/4HANA Public Cloud environment, I want to create a launchpad tile to access the app.

I created a custom tile using the URL generated from the deployment, but I'm stuck trying to associate it with a business catalog. When I try to add it, the system only allows me to select standard business catalogs, not my custom Z catalog.

Is this the right way to create a launchpad tile for a custom app in the public cloud? Has anyone else faced this problem and found a solution? Any help or advice would be greatly appreciated!

Kind Regards,

Marcelo Romeiro

Anji

entry.title: How to use grouping in a sap.ui.table in SAPUI5
entry.content:
I need to use grouping in 'sap.ui.table.Table'. Even that 'enableGrouping' property is deprecated according to SDK Documentation, it seems to be still partially working. When pressing the column title, I can set the grouping needed, but it should be default, without need to click on it manually each time. How can fire the event of grouping from the controller?

Is there a different way to do this?

Using 'sap.m.Table' is not an option, one of the main reasons is because part of the requirements is to use Columns with multiLabels, filters and sorting.

Here is my test code.

 

<mvc:View controllerName="ns.project1.controller.View1" xmlns="sap.ui.table" xmlns:m="sap.m" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
    <m:Page id="page" title="{i18n>title}">
       <Table
            enableGrouping="true" 
            groupBy="Name"
            rows="{Model>/ProductCollection}">
            <columns>
                <Column width="11rem" id="idMyColumn" sortProperty="Name" filterProperty="Name">
                    <m:Label text="Product Name" />
                    <template>
                        <m:Text text="{Model>Name}" wrapping="false" />
                    </template>
                </Column>
                <Column width="11rem">
                    <m:Label text="Product Id" />
                    <template>
                        <m:Input value="{Model>ProductId}"/>
                    </template>
                </Column>
            </columns>
        </Table>
    </m:Page>
</mvc:View>

entry.title: SAPUI5 Upload set with Table plugin send attachments after clicking on Save
entry.content:
Hi, 
I have below scenario related to UploadSetTablePlugin.
do we have a way to add the manual functionality of upload rather than using the default one? i want the functionality where i have a edit button -> and on clicking edit button i get three buttons: upload, save , cancel. when i click on upload the file come in UI Table but not sent to backend, and while clicking on save the post call happens. is this possible with uploadSetWithTable. if yes can you please provide the solution?

I am also facing issues while implementing it:
The "plugins.UploadSetwithTable" class doesn't exist in the "sap.m" namespace.
The "rowConfiguration" name is neither a class name in the "sap.m" namespace nor an aggregation of its parent tag.
The "upload.UploadItemConfiguration" name is neither a class name in the "sap.m" namespace nor an aggregation of its parent tag.

 <Table
            id="table-uploadSet"
            sticky="ColumnHeaders,HeaderToolbar"
            width="auto"
            mode="MultiSelect"
            fixedLayout="false"
            inset="true"
            autoPopinMode="true"
            hiddenInPopin="None"
            items="{
                path: 'mediaFile',
                parameters: {
                    select: 'createdAt'
                },
                templateShareable: false
            }"
            selectionChange="handler.onSelectionChange"
        >
            <headerToolbar>
                <OverflowToolbar>
                    <ToolbarSpacer />
                    <SearchField
                        width="20%"
                        liveChange="onSearch"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="NeverOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </SearchField>
                    <ToolbarSeparator />
                    <!-- Use the UploadButtonPlaceholder to add the UploadButton to the toolbar -->
                    <upload:ActionsPlaceholder
                        id="uploadButton"
                        placeholderFor="UploadButtonPlaceholder"
                    />
                    <Button
                        id="downloadSelectedButton"
                        text="Download"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onDownloadFiles"
                    />
                    <MenuButton text="Add">
                        <menu>
                            <Menu>
                                <MenuItem
                                    text="URL"
                                    press="openAddOrEditDialog"
                                />
                            </Menu>
                        </menu>
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </MenuButton>
                    <Button
                        id="removeDocumentButton"
                        text="Remove"
                        press="onRemoveButtonPress"
                        enabled="false"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
                    <Button
                        id="renameButton"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onRenameDocument"
                        text="Rename"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
                    <Button
                        id="editUrlButton"
                        text="Edit URL"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onEditUrl"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
                </OverflowToolbar>
            </headerToolbar>
            <dependents>
                <plugins.UploadSetwithTable
                    id="uploadSetPlugin"					
                    httpRequestMethod="Put"
                    multiple="false"
                    beforeInitiatingItemUpload="handler.onBeforeUploadStarts"
                    itemRenamed="onDocumentRenamedSuccess"
                    uploadCompleted="handler.onUploadCompleted"
                    onActivated="onPluginActivated"
                    cloudFilePickerEnabled="true"
                    actions="uploadButton"
                >
                    <rowConfiguration>
                        <upload.UploadItemConfiguration
                            fileNamePath="fileName"
                            mediaTypePath="mediaType"
                            urlPath="url"
                            previewablePath="previewable"
                            fileSizePath="fileSize"
                            isTrustedSourcePath="trustedSource"
                        />
                    </rowConfiguration>
                </plugins.UploadSetwithTable>
            </dependents>
            <columns>
                <Column
                    id="fileName"
                    importance="High"
                >
                    <header>
                        <Label text="File Name" />
                    </header>
                </Column>
                <Column
                    id="actionButton"
                    importance="High"
                />
            </columns>
            <items>
                <ColumnListItem
                    press="onItemPress"
                    highlight="{= ${documents>uploadState} === 'Complete' ? 'Indication05' : null }"
                >
                    <!-- Cells with cell template defining content for each column (cells and columns work with 1:1 mapping) -->
                    <cells>
                        <HBox>
                            <Image
                                src="{url}"
                                class="sapMUSTItemImage sapMUSTItemIcon"
                            />
                            <VBox class="sapUiTinyMargin sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
                                <Link
                                    text="{fileName}"
                                    press="handler.openPreview"
                                    class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"
                                />
                                <Text text="{createdBy}" />
                            </VBox>
                        </HBox>
                        <Button
                            class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin"
                            type="Transparent"
                            icon="sap-icon://decline"
                            press="onRemoveHandler"
                        />
                    </cells>
                </ColumnListItem>
            </items>
        </Table>

Please provide suggestions.
Thank you.

entry.title: Posting Output Tax in Customer Down payment Request using Milestone Biling
entry.content:
Hello ,

I am creating a down payment request using the milestone billing plan in the sales order.

In the current accounting document generated for the down payment request, I see only one line posted to the noted item GL, showing both the down payment and tax amounts. The actual accounting entry only occurs when the incoming down payment is posted through transaction F-29.

However, as per legal requirements in Saudi Arabia and the UAE, the business needs output tax to be posted and reported to the tax authorities at the time of creating the Down Payment Request/Advance Invoice itself.

The expected accounting postings are as follows (Total Invoiced Amount = USD 256.30, Down Payment = 20% = USD 51.26, Tax Rate = 15%):

1. Issuance of Advance Tax Invoice / Down Payment Request

  • Dr Customer A/R (including tax) .................................... 58.95

  • Cr Down Payment Clearing – Special GL (net) ............. 51.26

  • Cr Tax Payable (VAT Output) ............................................ 7.69

2. Receipt of Advance Payment from Customer

  • Dr Bank (including tax) ......................................................... 58.95

  • Cr Customer A/R (including tax) ......................................... 58.95

3. Issuance of Final Tax Invoice

  • Dr Customer A/R (including tax) ........................................ 235.80

  • Dr Down Payment Clearing – Special GL (net) ............. 51.26

  • Cr Sales Revenue ....................................................................... 256.30

  • Cr Tax Payable (VAT Output) ............................................ 30.76

Note: If possible, the net VAT on the balance payment should be reflected as a single line.

Could you please advise how these desired postings can be achieved?

Regards

Mohammed Roshan

entry.title: how do I send a request to the SPA workflow from Custom fiori app?
entry.content:
Hi all,
 I'm having an issue with the SAP build process automation.  I created a simple workflow structure and deployed. After, I tested whether  the workflow service on the api.sap site and Postman.   The workflow is working and successfully ı see task in myinbox. 
But when ı try to request from my  custom fiori it gives error.  When I adapt the request in the post, I get a cors error.  So  I thought I definitely needed to send a request through the destination, so I created a destination from the service instance. 
my destination :


After  I described this destinationin xs.app.json file like that

      {
      "source": "^/spalast/(.*)$",
      "target": "/public/workflow/rest/v1/$1",
      "destination": "spa",
      "authenticationType": "none",
      "csrfProtection": false
    },
and lastly my test requests: 

             fetch("/spalast/workflow-instances", {
                method: "POST",
                headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    definitionId: "eu10.integration-suite-dev-25mloa6z.employeeapitriggerprocess.employeeProcess",
                    context: { employee: { /* ... */ } }
                })
            });
              fetch("/spalast/workflow-instances", {
                method: "GET",
                headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }
            });

ıt  gives 403 error  from the POST request and 404 error from the GET request.

What could be the reason for this?  Most of the blogs I read also redirect in this way.

entry.title: What end-to-end testing tools are best for SAP BTP (BAS) applications with CDS views and SAPUI5?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) projects deployed on SAP BTP that use CDS views as the data model and SAPUI5 for the front end.

I would like to implement end-to-end testing for these applications. I am familiar with general-purpose tools like Playwright or WebdriverIO, but I am not sure if they are the best fit when testing applications in the SAP ecosystem (especially those with CDS/OData services and SAPUI5).

  • Has anyone successfully used Playwright or WebdriverIO for BAS/SAPUI5 projects?

  • Are there recommended frameworks or libraries specifically designed for UI5 applications?

  • What are the best practices for handling such tests?

  • Any tutorials, examples, or community resources you could share?

Thanks in advance for your insights!
